title: Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections) (Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 7 ) Order, 2020
content:
21stAugust,2020 StatutoryInstruments 421
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO.72 OF2020
The Electoral Process Act, 2016
(Act No.35of2016)
The Electoral Process (Local Government By-Elections)
(Election Date and Time of Poll) (No. 7)
Order, 2020
INEXERCISEofthepowerscontainedinsection125oftheElectoral
ProcessAct,2016,thefollowingOrderismade:
1. This Order may be cited as the Electoral Process (Local Title
GovernmentBy-Elections)(ElectionDateandTimeofPoll)(No.7)
Order,2020.
2. A candidate for election as a councillor in a district and Dateand
timeof
ward set out in the Schedule shall lodge a nomination with the
nomination
returningofficer onThursday, 27thAugust,2020, between0900 forelection
hoursand1500hours.
3. The campaign period shall commence on Thursday, 27th
Campaign
August,2020,at1500hoursandcloseat1800hoursonWednesday, period
16thSeptember,2020.
4. (1) Thepollfortheelectionofacouncillorinadistrictand Electiondate
ward set out in the Schedule shall take place on Thursday, 17th andtimeof
poll
September,2020,between0600hoursand1800hours.
(2) Apollshallnotbetakeninadistrictandwardifonlyone
candidateisvalidlynominated.
CopiesofthisStatutoryInstrumentcanbeobtainedfromtheGovernmentPrinter,
P.O.Box30136,10101,Lusaka,PriceK4.00 each
422 StatutoryInstruments 21stAugust,2020

(Paragraphs2and4)
